name: Satmetrix
overview:
Satmetrix is a leading global provider of customer experience management software applications and the co-developer of Net PromoterÂ®. The companyâ€™s software delivers actionable customer feedback to drive growth, fuel innovation, and amplify positive word-of-mouth.

Implemented and live in as little as four weeks, Satmetrix Xperienceâ„¢ is the newest addition to the Satmetrix industry-leading customer experience management product line-up. It is a standardized, cloud-based application designed specifically for organizations craving a quick and easy-to-deploy solution for collecting, analyzing, and acting on customer feedback. This new application is based on 12 years of thought leadership and best practices gained from over 700 global deployments for leading companies such as Symantec, Cummins, Dell, AAA, ING, tw telecom, and Experian.

For more information, visit www.satmetrix.com, or call 1-888-800-2313 in the United States or +44 (0) 845-371-1040 in Europe.
